godseeker_aniri_a2.effect: Extends all ally buff durations by 1 turn (100% chance)
godseeker_aniri_a2.notes: PREMIUM buff extension skill. 100% extend +1 turn, 4-turn CD. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for buff-heavy teams (shields, Increase DEF, Increase ATK, etc.).

other_champions.description: Some champions have buff extension skills (Mausoleum Mage A2, Skullcrown passive, etc.). Rare mechanic.
other_champions.notes: Godseeker Aniri is MOST COMMON buff extension champion for end-game content.

lasting_gifts_t6.effect: 30% chance to extend buff duration by 1 turn when placing buff
lasting_gifts_t6.notes: PREMIUM mastery for buff champions. 30% chance = +30% uptime for 2-turn buffs (2-turn → 3-turn 30% of time). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for all buff champions.

uptime_calculation.formula: Extended Uptime = (Base Duration + Extension Chance × 1 turn) / (Cooldown + 1)

2_turn_buff_4_turn_cd_lasting_gifts_30_p.notes: 2-turn buff, 4-turn CD, Lasting Gifts T6 (30% extend +1 turn): Expected duration = 2 + (0.30 × 1) = 2.30 turns. Uptime = 2.30 / (4 + 1) = 46% (+15% relative increase).

2_turn_buff_4_turn_cd_godseeker_aniri_10.notes: 2-turn buff, 4-turn CD, Godseeker Aniri A2 (100% extend +1 turn): Expected duration = 2 + (1.00 × 1) = 3 turns. Uptime = 3 / (4 + 1) = 60% (+50% relative increase).

2_turn_buff_4_turn_cd_both_extensions.notes: 2-turn buff, 4-turn CD, Lasting Gifts T6 (30% chance) + Godseeker Aniri A2 (100% extend): Godseeker extends 2-turn → 3-turn (guaranteed). Lasting Gifts has 30% chance to extend 3-turn → 4-turn. Expected duration = 3 + (0.30 × 1) = 3.30 turns. Uptime = 3.30 / (4 + 1) = 66% (+65% relative increase vs base 40%).

brogni_shield_uptime.impact_on_survivability: Shield uptime 40% → 66% = team survival increases from 50-55 turns → 60+ turns. MASSIVE survivability increase.
brogni_shield_uptime.notes: Buff extension is CRITICAL for Brogni shield uptime. Godseeker Aniri A2 (100% extend) increases shield uptime from 40% → 60% (+50% relative increase). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Brogni teams.

mithrala_shield_uptime.impact_on_survivability: Shield uptime 40% → 60% = team survival increases. Continuous Heal uptime also increases (dual buff extension).
mithrala_shield_uptime.notes: Buff extension is HIGH VALUE for Mithrala. Extends both Shield AND Continuous Heal duration (+50% uptime for both buffs). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

increase_def_uptime.impact_on_survivability: Increase DEF uptime 40% → 60% = damage reduction uptime increases by 50%. Team survival increases from 50-55 turns → 60+ turns.
increase_def_uptime.notes: Buff extension is CRITICAL for Increase DEF uptime. Godseeker Aniri A2 extends BOTH Shield AND Increase DEF duration (dual buff extension). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Brogni teams.

increase_atk_uptime.skill: Godseeker Aniri A3 (Increase ATK 50% + Increase C.RATE 30%)
increase_atk_uptime.impact_on_damage: Increase ATK uptime 40% → 60% = team damage increases by 50% (more turns with 1.5× damage multiplier). MASSIVE damage increase.
increase_atk_uptime.notes: Buff extension is HIGH VALUE for Increase ATK. Godseeker Aniri A2 extends her own A3 buffs (Increase ATK 50% + Increase C.RATE 30%). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED (Godseeker Aniri extends her own buffs + all other ally buffs).

godseeker_aniri.effect: Extends all ally buff durations by 1 turn (100% chance)

godseeker_aniri.notes: Godseeker Aniri is PREMIUM buff extension champion. A2 extends ALL ally buffs (Shield, Increase DEF, Increase ATK, Continuous Heal, etc.) by 1 turn (100% chance). 4-turn CD. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for buff-heavy teams. CRITICAL: Godseeker Aniri A2 extends her own A3 buffs (Increase ATK 50% + Increase C.RATE 30%), increasing her own buff uptime from 40% → 60%.

clan_boss.notes: Godseeker Aniri A2 is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Clan Boss teams with buff champions. Extends Shield, Increase DEF, Increase ATK, Continuous Heal, etc. MASSIVE survivability + damage increase.

dungeons.notes: Godseeker Aniri is HIGH VALUE for dungeons. Extends Shield, Increase DEF, etc. for longer boss fight survival.

tier_s_shields.impact: Shield uptime 40% → 60% = team survival increases from 50-55 turns → 60+ turns. MASSIVE survivability increase.
tier_s_shields.notes: Extending Shield duration is HIGHEST PRIORITY (direct survivability impact). Godseeker Aniri A2 is PREMIUM for shield-heavy teams.

tier_a_increase_def.impact: Increase DEF uptime 40% → 60% = damage reduction uptime increases by 50%. Team survival increases from 50-55 turns → 60+ turns.

mistake_1_not_using_godseeker_aniri_for_.mistake: Not using Godseeker Aniri A2 for teams with 2+ buff champions (Brogni, Mithrala, etc.)
mistake_1_not_using_godseeker_aniri_for_.impact: Buff uptime drops from 60% (with Godseeker Aniri) to 40% (without). Team survival drops from 60+ turns → 50-55 turns. Damage output drops (fewer turns with Increase ATK buff).
mistake_1_not_using_godseeker_aniri_for_.solution: USE Godseeker Aniri for buff-heavy teams (Brogni, Mithrala, etc.). Godseeker Aniri A2 extends ALL ally buffs (Shield, Increase DEF, Increase ATK, Continuous Heal, etc.) by 1 turn (100% chance). HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

mistake_2_not_taking_lasting_gifts_on_bu.mistake: Not taking Lasting Gifts T6 on buff champions (Brogni, Mithrala, Godseeker Aniri)
mistake_2_not_taking_lasting_gifts_on_bu.impact: Buff uptime drops from 46-52% (with Lasting Gifts) to 40% (without). Team survival drops slightly. Damage output drops slightly.
mistake_2_not_taking_lasting_gifts_on_bu.solution: ALWAYS take Lasting Gifts T6 on buff champions (Brogni, Mithrala, Godseeker Aniri, etc.). 30% chance to extend buff duration +1 turn = +15% uptime. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

mistake_3_godseeker_aniri_a2_cooldown_no.mistake: Using Godseeker Aniri A2 (4-turn CD) when buffs have just been placed (2-turn duration). Buff expires before Godseeker Aniri A2 is available again.
mistake_3_godseeker_aniri_a2_cooldown_no.impact: Buff extension wasted (buff expires before extension). Buff uptime remains at 40% (no extension benefit).
mistake_3_godseeker_aniri_a2_cooldown_no.solution: SPEED TUNE Godseeker Aniri to use A2 on turn 2 of buff duration (extends 2-turn → 3-turn, buff lasts until next cycle). Requires precise speed tuning (Godseeker Aniri moves after buff champion, before buff expires).

mistake_4_relying_on_lasting_gifts_alone.mistake: Relying on Lasting Gifts T6 (30% chance) alone for buff extension
mistake_4_relying_on_lasting_gifts_alone.impact: Lasting Gifts is RNG-based (30% chance). Uptime increases from 40% → 46% (only +15% relative increase). MODERATE improvement, but NOT reliable.
mistake_4_relying_on_lasting_gifts_alone.solution: Use Godseeker Aniri A2 (100% extend) for RELIABLE buff extension. Lasting Gifts T6 is SUPPLEMENT (adds +6-10% uptime on top of Godseeker Aniri A2). Use BOTH for maximum uptime (66% uptime with both).
